medical_history.chief_complaint: Progressively worsening right lower quadrant (RLQ) pain for 24 hours.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient's symptoms began 24 hours prior to evaluation, with worsening RLQ pain that was associated with subjective fevers, chills, and anorexia. Pain persisted throughout the day, prompting the patient to seek medical evaluation.
medical_history.family_history: No family history of inflammatory bowel disease (IBD) or gastrointestinal malignancy.
